key.name: parallel
key.description: Number of workers to use when performing builds. -1 for sensible default. 0 for number of CPU.

key.name: clear-build-log-pane
key.description: If enabled, build log pane will be cleared on rebuild.

key.name: show-log-for-build
key.description: If enabled, the build log will be raised when a build starts

key.name: allow-network-when-metered
key.description: Enable automated transfers upon building such as SDK downloads and dependencies when connection is metered.
